What is Infocity?

We are delighted to offer you an online platform where you can learn about the quality of life in a particular city. If you are considering moving or simply curious about a city, you have come to the right place. On Infocity, you will find a wealth of information about the quality of life in various cities around the world. You will find: demographic data, health statistics, crime information, education information and much more. In addition, our website is user-friendly and intuitive. Simply search for the name of the city you are interested in and you will have access to all the information you need.
